blocks.name: cclm
blocks.content: Syntax for the class of subcomplex modules.
blocks.origin: const class cclm { CMod }

blocks.name: diff.cclm.s
diff.cclm.c
diff.cclm.w
df-clm
blocks.content: Define the class of subcomplex modules, which are left modules over a subring of the field of complex numbers ` CCfld ` , which allows us to use the complex addition, multiplication, etc. in theorems about subcomplex modules. Since the field of complex numbers is commutative and so are its subrings (see ~ subrgcrng ), left modules over such subrings are the same as right modules, see ~ rmodislmod . Therefore, we drop the word "left" from "subcomplex left module". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: isclm
blocks.content: A subcomplex module is a left module over a subring of the field of complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isclm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1))
} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))))
  elrab2(hs2, c0, cclm, clmod, wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wsbc(hs0, cfv(csca, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(ccnfld, cress, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))))
  sbcied(hs0, cfv(csca, cv(hs2)), universe, wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wsbc(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(ccnfld, cress, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))), wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  fvexd(csca, cv(hs2), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  sbcied(hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), universe, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(ccnfld, cress, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  fvexd(cbs, cv(hs0), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(ccnfld, cress, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs0), co(ccnfld, cress, cv(hs1)), c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cress, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  eleq1d(cv(hs1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld), c2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))))
  fveq2d(cbs, cv(hs0), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(csca, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(csca, cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(csca, c0), wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), c0, csca)
  df-clm(hs2, hs0, hs1)
  3anass(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(clmod)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs2), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(csca, cv(hs2)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isclm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß(c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))))
  elrab2(hs2, c0, cclm, clmod, (c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)), [(Scalar ` hs2)/ hs0][(Base ` hs0)/ hs1](hs0 =(CCfld[|`s]hs1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  sbcied(hs0, (Scalar ` hs2), universe, hs2 = c0, [(Base ` hs0)/ hs1](hs0 =(CCfld[|`s]hs1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)), (c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  fvexd(csca, hs2, hs2 = c0)
  sbcied(hs1, (Base ` hs0), universe, (hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)), (hs0 =(CCfld[|`s]hs1)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)), (c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  fvexd(cbs, hs0, (hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)))
  anbi12d(((hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2))‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)), hs0 =(CCfld[|`s]hs1), hs1 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  eqeq12d(hs0, (CCfld[|`s]hs1), c1, (CCfld[|`s]c2), ((hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2))‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  adantr((hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)), hs1 =(Base ` hs0), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cress, hs1, c2, ((hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2))‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  eleq1d(hs1, (SubRing ` CCfld), c2, ((hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2))‚àß hs1 =(Base ` hs0)))
  sylan9eqr(hs1, c2, (Base ` hs0), (hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)), hs1 =(Base ` hs0))
  id(hs1 =(Base ` hs0))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c1), (hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)))
  fveq2d(cbs, hs0, c1, (hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)))
  sylan9eqr(hs0, c1, (Scalar ` hs2), hs2 = c0, hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2))
  id(hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2))
  syl6eqr((Scalar ` hs2), c1, (Scalar ` c0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq2(hs2, c0, csca)
  df-clm(hs2, hs0, hs1)
  3anass(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(clmod)
  diff.hs2.w((c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  diff.hs0.c((Scalar ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.w((hs2 = c0 ‚àß hs0 =(Scalar ` hs2)))
  diff.hs1.w((c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: clmsca
blocks.content: The ring of scalars ` F ` of a subcomplex module is the restriction of the field of complex numbers to the base set of ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clmsubrg
blocks.content: The base set of the ring of scalars of a subcomplex module is the base set of a subring of the field of complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clmlmod
blocks.content: A subcomplex module is a left module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clmgrp
blocks.content: A subcomplex module is an additive group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clmabl
blocks.content: A subcomplex module is an abelian group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clmring
blocks.content: The scalar ring of a subcomplex module is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clmfgrp
blocks.content: The scalar ring of a subcomplex module is a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: clm0
blocks.content: The zero of the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clm0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(nat0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(c0, cclm))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  clmsubrg(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  subrg0(cfv(cbs, c1), ccnfld, nat0, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  cnfld0()
  fveq2d(c0g, c1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clm0(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üí 0 =(0 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
} = {
  eqtr4d(nat0, (0 ` c1), (0 `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, 0 =(0 `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), (Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  clmsubrg(c0, (Base ` c1), c1)
  subrg0((Base ` c1), ccnfld, nat0, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)))
  cnfld0()
  fveq2d(c0g, c1, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsca(c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
}

blocks.name: clm1
blocks.content: The identity of the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clm1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(nat1, cfv(cur, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(nat1, cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cur, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(c0, cclm))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(nat1, cfv(cur, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  clmsubrg(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  subrg1(cfv(cbs, c1), ccnfld, nat1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  cnfld1()
  fveq2d(cur, c1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clm1(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üí 1 =(1r ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
} = {
  eqtr4d(nat1, (1r ` c1), (1r `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, 1 =(1r `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), (Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  clmsubrg(c0, (Base ` c1), c1)
  subrg1((Base ` c1), ccnfld, nat1, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)))
  cnfld1()
  fveq2d(cur, c1, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsca(c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
}

blocks.name: clmadd
blocks.content: The addition of the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmadd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  syl6reqr(caddc, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(c0, cclm))
  fveq2d(cplusg, c1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c1)
  ressplusg(cfv(cbs, c1), universe, caddc, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), ccnfld)
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  cnfldadd()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmadd(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üí + =(+ ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
} = {
  syl6reqr(caddc, (+ ` c1), (+ `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  fveq2d(cplusg, c1, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsca(c0, c1, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  ax-mp(+ =(+ `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), (Base ` c1)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cbs, c1)
  ressplusg((Base ` c1), universe, caddc, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), ccnfld)
  eqid((CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)))
  cnfldadd()
}

blocks.name: clmmul
blocks.content: The multiplication of the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmmul(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  syl6reqr(cmul, cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(c0, cclm))
  fveq2d(cmulr, c1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c1)
  ressmulr(cfv(cbs, c1), universe, cmul, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), ccnfld)
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  cnfldmul()
}

thm clmmul(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üí √ó =(√ó ` c1))

} = {
  syl6reqr(cmul, (√ó ` c1), (√ó `(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1))), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  fveq2d(cmulr, c1, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsca(c0, c1, (Base ` c1))

blocks.name: isclmi
blocks.content: Reverse direction of ~ isclm . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isclmi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wcel(c0, cclm))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  eqtrd(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, c1)), co(ccnfld, cress, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cress, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  eqtr4d(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))))
  subrgbas(c2, ccnfld, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  fveq2d(cbs, c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  simp2(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, clmod), wceq(c1, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  isclm(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
}

thm isclmi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))‚Üí c0 ‚àà CMod)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)
} = {
  syl3anbrc((c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)), c0 ‚àà CMod, c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 =(CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), (Base ` c1)‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  simp1(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  eqtrd(c1, (CCfld[|`s](Base ` c1)), (CCfld[|`s]c2), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cress, c2, (Base ` c1), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  eqeltrrd((Base ` c1), (SubRing ` CCfld), c2, (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  eqtr4d(c2, (Base ` c1), (Base `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), c2 =(Base `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))
  subrgbas(c2, ccnfld, (CCfld[|`s]c2))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]c2))
  fveq2d(cbs, c1, (CCfld[|`s]c2), (c0 ‚àà LMod ‚àß c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2)‚àß c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  simp2(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà LMod, c1 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))

blocks.name: clmsub
blocks.content: Subtraction in the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cmin, c3), co(c1, cfv(csg, c4), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c1, cmin, c3), co(c1, cfv(csg, c4), c3), co(c1, cfv(csg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, cmin, c3), co(c1, cfv(csg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c4)
  subrgsubg(c2, ccnfld)
  subgsub(c2, ccnfld, c1, c3, cmin, cfv(csg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  cnfldsub()
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  eqid(cfv(csg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))
  oveqd(c1, cfv(csg, c4), c3, cfv(csg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(csg, c4), cfv(csg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))))
  fveq2d(csg, c4, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[-]c3)=(c1[(-g ` c4)]c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c4)
} = {
  eqtr4d((c1[-]c3), (c1[(-g ` c4)]c3), (c1[(-g `(CCfld[|`s]c2))]c3), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[-]c3)=(c1[(-g `(CCfld[|`s]c2))]c3), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld))
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c4)
  subrgsubg(c2, ccnfld)
  subgsub(c2, ccnfld, c1, c3, cmin, (-g `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (CCfld[|`s]c2))
  cnfldsub()
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]c2))
  eqid((-g `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))
  oveqd(c1, (-g ` c4), c3, (-g `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (-g ` c4)=(-g `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))
  fveq2d(csg, c4, (CCfld[|`s]c2), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsca(c0, c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: clmneg
blocks.content: Negation in the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cneg(c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(cneg(c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c3), c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cminusg, c3), c1, cfv(cminusg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cminusg, c3), cfv(cminusg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))))
  fveq2d(cminusg, c3, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c3, c2)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c3)
  subrgsubg(c2, ccnfld)
  subginv(c2, ccnfld, c1, cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cfv(cminusg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), c1), cneg(c1)), wcel(c1, cc))
  sselda(c1, c2, cc, wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsscn(c0, c2, c3)
  cnfldneg(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí -u(c1)=((invg ` c3)` c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(-u(c1), ((invg ` c3)` c1), ((invg `(CCfld[|`s]c2))` c1), ((invg ` CCfld)` c1), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  fveq1d((invg ` c3), c1, (invg `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (invg ` c3)=(invg `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))
  fveq2d(cminusg, c3, (CCfld[|`s]c2), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsca(c0, c3, c2)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` CCfld)` c1)=((invg `(CCfld[|`s]c2))` c1), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld))
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c3)
  subrgsubg(c2, ccnfld)
  subginv(c2, ccnfld, c1, (invg ` CCfld), (invg `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (CCfld[|`s]c2))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]c2))
  eqid((invg ` CCfld))
  eqid((invg `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((invg ` CCfld)` c1)= -u(c1), c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  sselda(c1, c2, cc, c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmsscn(c0, c2, c3)
  cnfldneg(c1)
}

blocks.content: Norm in the scalar ring of a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmabs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cfv(cnm, c3), c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  eqtr2d(cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cfv(cnm, c3), c1), cfv(cfv(cnm, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cnm, c3), c1, cfv(cnm, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cnm, c3), cfv(cnm, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))))
  fveq2d(cnm, c3, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsca(c0, c3, c2)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnm, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c1), cfv(cabs, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c3)
  subrgsubg(c2, ccnfld)
  subgnm2(c2, ccnfld, c1, cfv(cnm, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), cabs, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  cnfldnm()
  eqid(cfv(cnm, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(abs ` c1)=((norm ` c3)` c1))

} = {

  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, (norm ` c3)=(norm `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))
  fveq2d(cnm, c3, (CCfld[|`s]c2), c0 ‚àà CMod)

  sylan(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((norm `(CCfld[|`s]c2))` c1)=(abs ` c1), c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld))
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c2 ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c3)

blocks.name: lmhmclm
blocks.content: The domain of a linear operator is a subcomplex module iff the range is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmhmclm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cclm), wcel(c2, cclm)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, cclm), wcel(c2, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, clmod), wceq(cfv(csca, c1), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), w3a(wcel(c2, clmod), wceq(cfv(csca, c2), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))))
  3anbi123d(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, clmod), wceq(cfv(csca, c1), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, clmod), wceq(cfv(csca, c2), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  2thd(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod))
  lmhmlmod1(c0, c1, c2)
  lmhmlmod2(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq12d(cfv(csca, c1), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))), cfv(csca, c2), co(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2))), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cress, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)))
  eleq1d(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(csubrg, ccnfld), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)))
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(csca, c1), cfv(csca, c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)))
  eqcomd(cfv(csca, c1), cfv(csca, c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)))
  lmhmsca(c0, c1, c2, cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1))
  isclm(c1, cfv(csca, c1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)))
  isclm(c2, cfv(csca, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmhmclm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚àà CMod ‚Üî c2 ‚àà CMod))
} = {
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2), c1 ‚àà CMod, c2 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà LMod ‚àß(Scalar ` c1)=(CCfld[|`s](Base `(Scalar ` c1)))‚àß(Base `(Scalar ` c1))‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)), (c2 ‚àà LMod ‚àß(Scalar ` c2)=(CCfld[|`s](Base `(Scalar ` c2)))‚àß(Base `(Scalar ` c2))‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)))
  3anbi123d(c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2), c1 ‚àà LMod, (Scalar ` c1)=(CCfld[|`s](Base `(Scalar ` c1))), (Base `(Scalar ` c1))‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), c2 ‚àà LMod, (Scalar ` c2)=(CCfld[|`s](Base `(Scalar ` c2))), (Base `(Scalar ` c2))‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  2thd(c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2), c1 ‚àà LMod, c2 ‚àà LMod)
  lmhmlmod1(c0, c1, c2)
  lmhmlmod2(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq12d((Scalar ` c1), (CCfld[|`s](Base `(Scalar ` c1))), (Scalar ` c2), (CCfld[|`s](Base `(Scalar ` c2))), c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cress, (Base `(Scalar ` c1)), (Base `(Scalar ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2))
  eleq1d((Base `(Scalar ` c1)), (SubRing ` CCfld), (Base `(Scalar ` c2)), c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2))
  fveq2d(cbs, (Scalar ` c1), (Scalar ` c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2))
  eqcomd((Scalar ` c1), (Scalar ` c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[LMHom]c2))
  lmhmsca(c0, c1, c2, (Scalar ` c2), (Scalar ` c1))
  isclm(c1, (Scalar ` c1), (Base `(Scalar ` c1)))
  eqid((Scalar ` c1))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c1)))
  isclm(c2, (Scalar ` c2), (Base `(Scalar ` c2)))
  eqid((Scalar ` c2))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c2)))
}

thm clmvsass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmul, c3), c6, c4), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c7))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, cmul, c3), c6, c4), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c7), c3), c6, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cmul, c3), c6, c4, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c7), c3), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  oveqd(c1, cmul, c3, cfv(cmulr, c7), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, c7)))
  clmmul(c0, c7)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c7), c3), c6, c4), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvsass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cmulr, c7), c6, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c7))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvsass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5))‚Üí((c1[√ó]c3)[c6]c4)=(c1[c6](c3[c6]c4)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c7)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1[√ó]c3)[c6]c4), (c1[c6](c3[c6]c4)), ((c1[(√ó ` c7)]c3)[c6]c4), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)))
  oveq1d((c1[√ó]c3), c6, c4, (c1[(√ó ` c7)]c3), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)))
  oveqd(c1, cmul, c3, (√ó ` c7), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), √ó =(√ó ` c7))
  clmmul(c0, c7)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ((c1[(√ó ` c7)]c3)[c6]c4)=(c1[c6](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ‚àà LMod)
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvsass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (√ó ` c7), c6, c7)
  eqid((√ó ` c7))
}

blocks.name: clmvscom
blocks.content: Commutative law for the scalar product. (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 7-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvscom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(c3, c6, co(c1, c6, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c7))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(c3, c6, co(c1, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, cmul, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c3, cmul, c1), c6, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cmul, c3), c6, c4, co(c3, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  impcom(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5), wi(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  syl11(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wss(c2, cc))
  anim12d(wss(c2, cc), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  ssel(c2, cc, c1)
  ssel(c2, cc, c3)
  clmsscn(c0, c2, c7)
  mulcom(c1, c3)
  clmvsass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(c3, cmul, c1), c6, c4), co(c3, c6, co(c1, c6, c4))), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3ancoma(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  clmvsass(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvscom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5))‚Üí(c1[c6](c3[c6]c4))=(c3[c6](c1[c6]c4)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c7)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c1[c6](c3[c6]c4)), (c3[c6](c1[c6]c4)), ((c1[√ó]c3)[c6]c4), ((c3[√ó]c1)[c6]c4), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)))
  oveq1d((c1[√ó]c3), c6, c4, (c3[√ó]c1), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)), (c1[√ó]c3)=(c3[√ó]c1), (c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  impcom(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), (c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  3adant3(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5, (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)))
  syl11((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), c2 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  anim12d(c2 ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ssel(c2, cc, c1)
  ssel(c2, cc, c3)
  clmsscn(c0, c2, c7)
  mulcom(c1, c3)
  clmvsass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
  sylan2b(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ((c3[√ó]c1)[c6]c4)=(c3[c6](c1[c6]c4)), (c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5))
  3ancoma(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5)
  clmvsass(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, c7)
}

blocks.name: clmvsdir
blocks.content: Distributive law for scalar product (right-distributivity). ( ~ lmodvsdir analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvsdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, co(c3, c6, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c8), c3), c6, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c8), c3), c6, c4)))
  oveq1d(co(c1, caddc, c3), c6, c4, co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c8), c3), wcel(c0, cclm))
  oveqd(c1, caddc, c3, cfv(cplusg, c8), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmadd(c0, c8)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c8), c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvsdir(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c8), c6, c7, c8)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c8))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvsdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5))‚Üí((c1[+]c3)[c6]c4)=((c1[c6]c4)[c7](c3[c6]c4)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c8)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1[+]c3)[c6]c4), ((c1[c6]c4)[c7](c3[c6]c4)), ((c1[(+ ` c8)]c3)[c6]c4), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ((c1[+]c3)[c6]c4)=((c1[(+ ` c8)]c3)[c6]c4))
  oveq1d((c1[+]c3), c6, c4, (c1[(+ ` c8)]c3), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  oveqd(c1, caddc, c3, (+ ` c8), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clmadd(c0, c8)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), ((c1[(+ ` c8)]c3)[c6]c4)=((c1[c6]c4)[c7](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ‚àà LMod)
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvsdir(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (+ ` c8), c6, c7, c8)
  eqid((+ ` c8))
}

blocks.name: clmvsdi
blocks.content: Distributive law for scalar product (left-distributivity). ( ~ lmodvsdi analog.) (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2006.) (Revised by AV, 28-Sep-2021.)

blocks.name: clmvs1
blocks.content: Scalar product with ring unit. ( ~ lmodvs1 analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1, co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1d(nat1, c3, c1, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(nat1, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0))))
  clm1(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), c3, c1), c1), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvs1(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(1[c3]c1)= c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(√ó ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((1[c3]c1), c1, ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[c3]c1), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  oveq1d(nat1, c3, c1, (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, 1 =(1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  clm1(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((1r `(Scalar ` c0))[c3]c1)= c1, c0 ‚àà LMod)
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvs1(c0, c1, c2, (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), c3, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: clmvs2
blocks.content: A vector plus itself is two times the vector. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.) (Revised by AV, 21-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), co(nat2, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrrd(co(c1, c3, c1), co(nat2, c4, c1), co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), c4, c1), co(co(nat1, c4, c1), c3, co(nat1, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat2, c4, c1), co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), c4, c1)))
  oveq1i(nat2, c4, c1, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))
  df-2()
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), c4, c1), co(co(nat1, c4, c1), c3, co(nat1, c4, c1))), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(nat1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(nat1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(nat1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  eqeltrd(nat1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clm1(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmod1cl(c0, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2))
  clmvsdir(c0, nat1, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), nat1, c1, c2, c4, c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  oveq12d(co(nat1, c4, c1), c3, co(nat1, c4, c1), c1, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  clmvs1(c0, c1, c2, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c3]c1)=(2[c4]c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtrrd((c1[c3]c1), (2[c4]c1), ((1[+]1)[c4]c1), ((1[c4]c1)[c3](1[c4]c1)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (2[c4]c1)=((1[+]1)[c4]c1))
  oveq1i(nat2, c4, c1, (1[+]1))
  df-2()
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((1[+]1)[c4]c1)=((1[c4]c1)[c3](1[c4]c1)), c0 ‚àà CMod, 1 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), 1 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c1 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, 1 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqeltrd(nat1, (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clm1(c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, (1r `(Scalar ` c0))‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c0 ‚àà LMod)
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmod1cl(c0, (1r `(Scalar ` c0)), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((1r `(Scalar ` c0)))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2)
  clmvsdir(c0, nat1, (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), nat1, c1, c2, c4, c3, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  oveq12d((1[c4]c1), c3, (1[c4]c1), c1, c1, (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  clmvs1(c0, c1, c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: clm0vs
blocks.content: Zero times a vector is the zero vector. Equation 1a of [Kreyszig] p. 51. ( ~ lmod0vs analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clm0vs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, c1), c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c0))

  clm0(c0, cfv(csca, c0))
  lmodfopne(c0, cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(csca, c0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))

  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)))

}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚Üí c1 ‚â† c2)

  ‚ä£ c1 =(+f ` c0)
} = {

  clmlmod(c0)

  a1i(c0 ‚àà CMod, 1 ‚â† 0)

}

thm isclmi0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wcel(c0, cclm)
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvsca, c0))

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))

  -| wcel(c0, cgrp)
  -| wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s2), c3)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c4, co(ccnfld, cress, c5)), wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))), wral(s0, c3, wa(wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, c5, w3a(wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3), wral(s2, c3, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c5, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))))))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(c4, co(ccnfld, cress, c5)), wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  rgen(s0, c3, wa(wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, c5, w3a(wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3), wral(s2, c3, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c5, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))))))
  jca(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wral(s1, c5, w3a(wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3), wral(s2, c3, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c5, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))))
  ralrimiva(s1, c5, wcel(cv(s0), c3), w3a(wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3), wral(s2, c3, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c5, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))))
  3jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3), wral(s2, c3, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))))), wral(s2, c5, wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  ralrimiva(s2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  3expa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c3), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  3com12(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c3), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  ralrimiva(s2, c5, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))
  3expa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5), wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))
  3comr(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5), wa(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))))
  jca(w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: clmvneg1
blocks.content: Minus 1 times a vector is the negative of the vector. Equation 2 of [Kreyszig] p. 51. ( ~ lmodvneg1 analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvneg1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1), cfv(c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cminusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1), cfv(c4, c1), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), cfv(cur, c5)), c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1d(cneg(nat1), c3, c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), cfv(cur, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cneg(nat1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), cfv(cur, c5))))
  eqtrd(cneg(nat1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), cfv(cur, c5)), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), nat1), wcel(c0, cclm))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(cneg(nat1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  sseldd(nat1, cfv(cbs, c5), cz, wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmzss(c0, cfv(cbs, c5), c5)
  1zzd(wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmneg(c0, nat1, cfv(cbs, c5), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  fveq2d(cfv(cminusg, c5), nat1, cfv(cur, c5), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clm1(c0, c5)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c5), cfv(cur, c5)), c3, c1), cfv(c4, c1)), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)

thm clmvsneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(cneg(c1), c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cminusg, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cclm))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(cneg(c1), c2, c3), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c1), c2, c3), w0)
  lmodvsneg(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cminusg, c6), c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c6))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c5, cclm))
  clmlmod(c5)
  oveq1d(cneg(c1), c2, c3, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cneg(c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c1)), wcel(c5, cclm), wcel(c1, c7))
  clmneg(c5, c1, c7, c6)
}

thm clmvsneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1[c2]c3))=(-u(c1)[c2]c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Scalar ` c5)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c7)
} = {
  eqtr4d((c0 `(c1[c2]c3)), (-u(c1)[c2]c3), (((invg ` c6)` c1)[c2]c3), w0)
  lmodvsneg(c0, c1, c2, c3, (invg ` c6), c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)

}

thm clmmulg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c1[c4]c2)=(c1[c5]c2))

  oveq1(hs0, -u(hs1), c4, c2)
  oveq1(hs0, -u(hs1), c5, c2)
  eqeq12d((hs0[c4]c2), (hs0[c5]c2), (c1[c4]c2), (c1[c5]c2), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c4, c2)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c5, c2)

  clm0vs(c0, c2, c3, c5, (0 ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))

  syl5ibr(((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), (hs1[c4]c2)=(hs1[c5]c2), ((hs1[+]1)[c4]c2)=((hs1[+]1)[c5]c2), ((hs1[c4]c2)[(+ ` c0)]c2)=((hs1[c5]c2)[(+ ` c0)]c2))
  oveq1((hs1[c4]c2), (hs1[c5]c2), (+ ` c0), c2)
  eqeq12d(((hs1[+]1)[c4]c2), ((hs1[+]1)[c5]c2), ((hs1[c4]c2)[(+ ` c0)]c2), ((hs1[c5]c2)[(+ ` c0)]c2), ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), ((hs1[+]1)[c4]c2)=((hs1[c4]c2)[(+ ` c0)]c2), c0 ‚àà Mnd, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c2 ‚àà c3)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c2 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0 ‚àà Mnd)

blocks.name: clmsubdir
blocks.content: Scalar multiplication distributive law for subtraction. ( ~ lmodsubdir analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmsubdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, c3), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c4, co(c1, c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cclm))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, c3), co(co(c0, c2, c3), c4, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(co(c0, cfv(csg, c7), c1), c2, c3), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, c3, co(c0, cfv(csg, c7), c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, cfv(csg, c7), c1)), wcel(c6, cclm), wcel(c0, c8), wcel(c1, c8))
  clmsub(c6, c0, c8, c1, c7)
  lmodsubdir(c0, cfv(csg, c7), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csg, c7))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, clmod), wcel(c6, cclm))
  clmlmod(c6)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[-]c1)[c2]c3)=((c0[c2]c3)[c4](c1[c2]c3)))

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)

blocks.origin:
thm clmpm1dir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, cmin, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, co(cneg(nat1), c6, co(c3, c6, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c1, cmin, c3), c6, c4), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, co(cneg(nat1), c6, co(c3, c6, c4))), co(co(c1, c6, c4), cfv(csg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  clmsubdir(c1, c3, c6, c4, cfv(csg, c0), c5, c0, cfv(csca, c0), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c4), cfv(csg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c5), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c5), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  clmvscl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  grpsubval(co(c1, c6, c4), c5, co(c3, c6, c4), cfv(csg, c0), c7, cfv(cminusg, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(csg, c0))
  oveq2d(co(c1, c6, c4), c7, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), co(cneg(nat1), c6, co(c3, c6, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), co(cneg(nat1), c6, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c5), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5)))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  clmvscl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqcomd(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c0), co(c3, c6, c4)), co(cneg(nat1), c6, co(c3, c6, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c5)))
  clmvneg1(c0, co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c6, cfv(cminusg, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
}

  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)), (c1[c6]c4)‚àà c5, c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5)
  simpr1(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5)

  eqid((-g ` c0))

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)), ((invg ` c0)`(c3[c6]c4))=(-u(1)[c6](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ‚àà CMod, (c3[c6]c4)‚àà c5)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5)), (c3[c6]c4)‚àà c5, c0 ‚àà CMod, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 ‚àà c5)

blocks.name: clmnegneg
blocks.content: Double negative of a vector. (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2007.) (Revised by AV, 21-Sep-2021.)

thm clmnegneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1)), c1)), wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  3eqtr3a(co(cneg(nat1), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1)), c1, co(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), c3, c1), co(nat1, c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1i(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), c3, c1, nat1)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), c3, c1), co(cneg(nat1), c3, co(cneg(nat1), c3, c1))), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  clmneg1(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(csca, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2))
  clmvsass(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cneg(nat1), c1, c2, c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  clmvs1(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

thm clmsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, co(c4, c6, c5))), co(co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4)), c6, co(c3, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, co(c4, c6, c5))), co(co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4)), c6, co(c3, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5))), co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5))), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  oveq2d(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c7, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), c7, co(c4, c6, c5)), co(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5))), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(c5, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  clmvsdi(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c4, c2, c5, c7, c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c6, co(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5))), co(co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4)), c6, co(c3, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5)))), wcel(c0, ccmn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5), c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(c0, ccmn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c0, ccmn), wcel(c0, cabl))
  clmabl(c0)
  ablcmn(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cclm), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wa(wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5), c2)))
  anim12dan(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c5), c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c7, c4), c2), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c4, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c4, c2))
  clmvscl(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c4, c2, c7, cfv(csca, c0))

  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  clmneg1(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(csca, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c5, c2))
  clmvscl(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c5, c2, c7, cfv(csca, c0))

  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))

thm clmsub4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))‚Üí((c1[c6]c3)[c6](-u(1)[c7](c4[c6]c5)))=((c1[c6](-u(1)[c7]c4))[c6](c3[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1[c6]c3)[c6](-u(1)[c7](c4[c6]c5))), ((c1[c6](-u(1)[c7]c4))[c6](c3[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5))), ((c1[c6]c3)[c6]((-u(1)[c7]c4)[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5))), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)))
  oveq2d((c1[c6]c3), c6, (-u(1)[c7](c4[c6]c5)), ((-u(1)[c7]c4)[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), (-u(1)[c7](c4[c6]c5))=((-u(1)[c7]c4)[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5)))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), (-u(1)[c7](c4[c6]c5))=((-u(1)[c7]c4)[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5)), c0 ‚àà CMod, -u(1)‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), -u(1)‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), c5 ‚àà c2)
  simpr(c4 ‚àà c2, c5 ‚àà c2)
  clmvsdi(c0, -u(1), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c4, c2, c5, c7, c6, (Scalar ` c0))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c6]((-u(1)[c7]c4)[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5)))=((c1[c6](-u(1)[c7]c4))[c6](c3[c6](-u(1)[c7]c5))), c0 ‚àà CMnd, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((-u(1)[c7]c4)‚àà c2 ‚àß(-u(1)[c7]c5)‚àà c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà CMnd)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c0 ‚àà CMnd, c0 ‚àà Abel)
  clmabl(c0)
  ablcmn(c0)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà CMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), ((-u(1)[c7]c4)‚àà c2 ‚àß(-u(1)[c7]c5)‚àà c2))

  simpl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c4 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c4 ‚àà c2, -u(1)‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c4 ‚àà c2)
  clmvscl(c0, -u(1), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c4, c2, c7, (Scalar ` c0))

thm clmvsrinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

thm clmvslinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: clmvsubval
blocks.content: Value of vector subtraction in terms of addition in a subcomplex module. Analogue of ~ lmodvsubval2 . (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.) (Revised by AV, 7-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvsubval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c1, c5, co(cneg(nat1), c6, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c1, c5, co(cneg(nat1), c6, c3)), co(c1, c5, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7)), c6, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c1, c5, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7)), c6, c3))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvsubval2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7), c6, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c7))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7)), c6, c3), co(cneg(nat1), c6, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7)), c6, c3, cneg(nat1), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7)), cneg(nat1)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7)), cneg(nat1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), nat1), wcel(c0, cclm))
  fveq2d(cfv(cminusg, c7), cfv(cur, c7), nat1, wcel(c0, cclm))
  eqcomd(cfv(cur, c7), nat1, wcel(c0, cclm))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cclm), wceq(cneg(nat1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c7), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cfv(cbs, c7)))
  eqeltrd(nat1, cfv(cbs, c7), cfv(cur, c7), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clm1(c0, c7)
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cfv(cur, c7), cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(c7, crg))
  clmring(c0, c7)
  ringidcl(c7, cfv(cur, c7), cfv(cbs, c7))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c7))
  clmneg(c0, nat1, cfv(cbs, c7), c7)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c7))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvsubval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3)=(c1[c5](-u(1)[c6]c3)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1[c4]c3), (c1[c5](-u(1)[c6]c3)), (c1[c5](((invg ` c7)`(1r ` c7))[c6]c3)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c4]c3)=(c1[c5](((invg ` c7)`(1r ` c7))[c6]c3)), c0 ‚àà LMod)
  clmlmod(c0)
  lmodvsubval2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (invg ` c7), (1r ` c7), c6, c7)
  eqid((invg ` c7))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, (((invg ` c7)`(1r ` c7))[c6]c3), (-u(1)[c6]c3), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  oveq1d(((invg ` c7)`(1r ` c7)), c6, c3, -u(1), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, ((invg ` c7)`(1r ` c7))= -u(1))
  eqtr4d(((invg ` c7)`(1r ` c7)), -u(1), ((invg ` c7)` 1), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  fveq2d((invg ` c7), (1r ` c7), nat1, c0 ‚àà CMod)
  eqcomd((1r ` c7), nat1, c0 ‚àà CMod)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà CMod, -u(1)=((invg ` c7)` 1), 1 ‚àà(Base ` c7))
  eqeltrd(nat1, (Base ` c7), (1r ` c7), c0 ‚àà CMod)
  clm1(c0, c7)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, (1r ` c7)‚àà(Base ` c7), c7 ‚àà Ring)
  clmring(c0, c7)
  ringidcl(c7, (1r ` c7), (Base ` c7))
  eqid((1r ` c7))
  clmneg(c0, nat1, (Base ` c7), c7)
  eqid((Base ` c7))
}

blocks.name: clmvsubval2
blocks.content: Value of vector subtraction on a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.) (Revised by AV, 7-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvsubval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c6, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvsca, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c4, c3), co(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c6, c1), co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  clmvsubval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c5, c7)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c6, co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3)), co(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c6, c1)), wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c2))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cabl))
  clmabl(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c2), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, c7)))
  clmneg1(c0, cfv(cbs, c7), c7)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2))
  clmvscl(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, c7), c3, c2, c5, c7)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c7))
  ablcom(c0, c1, c2, co(cneg(nat1), c5, c3), c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvsubval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3)=((-u(1)[c5]c3)[c6]c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(√ó ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1[c4]c3), ((-u(1)[c5]c3)[c6]c1), (c1[c6](-u(1)[c5]c3)), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  clmvsubval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c5, c7)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c1[c6](-u(1)[c5]c3))=((-u(1)[c5]c3)[c6]c1), c0 ‚àà Abel, c1 ‚àà c2, (-u(1)[c5]c3)‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Abel)
  clmabl(c0)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (-u(1)[c5]c3)‚àà c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (-u(1)[c5]c3)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà CMod, -u(1)‚àà(Base ` c7), c3 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c3 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c3 ‚àà c2, -u(1)‚àà(Base ` c7))
  clmneg1(c0, (Base ` c7), c7)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c3 ‚àà c2)
  clmvscl(c0, -u(1), (Base ` c7), c3, c2, c5, c7)
  eqid((Base ` c7))
  ablcom(c0, c1, c2, (-u(1)[c5]c3), c6)
}

blocks.name: clmvz
blocks.content: Two ways to express the negative of a vector. (Contributed by NM, 29-Feb-2008.) (Revised by AV, 7-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm clmvz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvsca, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c3, c4, c1), co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), co(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), co(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  grpidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  clmvsubval2(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(csca, c0))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), c2))
  clmgrp(c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))))
  clmneg1(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(csca, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, c2))
  clmvscl(c0, cneg(nat1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), c1, c2, c5, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)))
  grprid(c0, co(cneg(nat1), c5, c1), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clmvz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3[c4]c1)=(-u(1)[c5]c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(-g ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(√ó ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c3[c4]c1), (-u(1)[c5]c1), ((-u(1)[c5]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3), (c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3[c4]c1)=((-u(1)[c5]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3), c0 ‚àà CMod, c3 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  syl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c3 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà Grp)
  grpidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  clmvsubval2(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, (+ ` c0), (Scalar ` c0))
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, ((-u(1)[c5]c1)[(+ ` c0)]c3)=(-u(1)[c5]c1), c0 ‚àà Grp, (-u(1)[c5]c1)‚àà c2)
  clmgrp(c0)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà CMod ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (-u(1)[c5]c1)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà CMod, -u(1)‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c1 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2, -u(1)‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  clmneg1(c0, (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà c2)
  clmvscl(c0, -u(1), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c1, c2, c5, (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  grprid(c0, (-u(1)[c5]c1), c2, (+ ` c0), c3)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: zlmclm
blocks.content: The ` ZZ ` -module operation turns an arbitrary abelian group into a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm zlmclm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cclm))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c0))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cclm))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, cclm), wcel(c1, clmod), wceq(cfv(csca, c1), co(ccnfld, cress, cz)), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  biimpi(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(c1, clmod))
  syl5reqr(cfv(csca, c1), co(ccnfld, cress, cz), zring, wcel(c0, cabl))
  df-zring()
  zlmsca(c0, cabl, c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cabl), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  zsubrg()
  isclmi(c1, cfv(csca, c1), cz)

}

thm zlmclm(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Abel ‚Üî c1 ‚àà CMod)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ZMod ` c0)
} = {
  impbii(c0 ‚àà Abel, c1 ‚àà CMod)
  syl3anc(c0 ‚àà Abel, c1 ‚àà CMod, c1 ‚àà LMod, (Scalar ` c1)=(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñ§), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  biimpi(c0 ‚àà Abel, c1 ‚àà LMod)
  syl5reqr((Scalar ` c1), (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñ§), zring, c0 ‚àà Abel)
  df-zring()
  zlmsca(c0, cabl, c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà Abel, ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  zsubrg()
  isclmi(c1, (Scalar ` c1), cz)
  eqid((Scalar ` c1))
  sylibr(c1 ‚àà CMod, c0 ‚àà Abel, c1 ‚àà LMod)
  clmlmod(c1)
  zlmlmod(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: clmzlmvsca
blocks.content: The scalar product of a subcomplex module matches the scalar product of the derived ` ZZ ` -module, which implies, together with ~ zlmbas and ~ zlmplusg , that any module over ` ZZ ` is structure-equivalent to the canonical ` ZZ ` -module ` ZMod `` G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Oct-2015.)

  -| wceq(c0, co(c7, cnmo, c8))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c7))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cnm, c8))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(csca, c7))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cbs, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cin(cnlm, cclm)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  nmoleub2lem2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cle, c5, c6, c7, c8, c9, c10, w0)

  ltle(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c5)

blocks.name: nmoleub3
blocks.content: The operator norm is the supremum of the value of a linear operator on the unit sphere. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Oct-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Sep-2021.)

blocks.name: nmhmcn
blocks.content: A linear operator over a normed subcomplex module is bounded iff it is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cmodscexp
blocks.content: The powers of ` _i ` belong to the scalar subring of a subcomplex module if ` _i ` belongs to the scalar subring . (Contributed by AV, 18-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmodscexp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(ci, cexp, c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(ci, cexp, c2), c1, co(c2, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), ci), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(c2, cn)))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(c2, cn), wceq(co(c2, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), ci), co(ci, cexp, c2)), wcel(ci, cc), wcel(c2, cn0))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  cnfldexp(ci, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), ci), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(ci, c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  clmsubrg(c0, c1, c3)
  subrgsubm(c1, ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cn0))
  nnnn0(c2)
  simplr(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, cn))

blocks.name: cmodscmulexp

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvsca, c0))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn))), wcel(co(co(ci, cexp, c4), c5, c2), c3), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(co(ci, cexp, c4), c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn)), wcel(c0, clmod))
  clmlmod(c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn))), wcel(co(ci, cexp, c4), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1)), wcel(c4, cn))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, cclm), w3a(wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn)), wcel(ci, c1))
  simp1(wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn))
  cmodscexp(c0, c1, c4, c6)
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(ci, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn))
  lmodvscl(c0, co(ci, cexp, c4), c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
